txt.en: Although already a master of battle, the Path of Freedom's Defender allows you to withstand greater assaults in battle, redirecting attention away from your companions in a prolonged fight.
You have begun to follow the path of the Freedom's Defender. If you follow this path to its end, you will find that your already considerable ability to survive attacks in a fight much improved.
Begin down the Path of Freedom's Defender
There are many challenges on along the Path of Freedom's Defender. Taking the first step may be the most difficult....
